verses.verse: "You shall make <WH6213> the altar <WH4196> of acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> long, <WH753> and five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> broad; <WH7341> the altar <WH4196> shall be foursquare: <WH7251> and its height <WH6967> shall be three <WH7969> cubits. <WH520>
You shall make <WH6213> its horns <WH7161> on its four <WH702> corners; <WH6438> its horns <WH7161> shall be of one piece with it; <WH6823> and you shall overlay it with brass. <WH5178>

You shall make <WH6213> its pots <WH5518> to take away its ashes, <WH1878> its shovels, <WH3257> its basins, <WH4219> its flesh hooks, <WH4207> and its fire pans: <WH4289> all its vessels <WH3627> you shall make <WH6213> of brass. <WH5178>

You shall make <WH6213> a grating <WH4345> for it of network <WH4639> of brass: <WH5178> and on the net <WH7568> you shall make <WH6213> four <WH702> bronze <WH5178> rings <WH2885> in its four <WH702> corners. <WH7098>
You shall put <WH5414> it under the ledge <WH3749> around the altar <WH4196> beneath, <WH4295> that the net <WH7568> may reach <WH5704> halfway <WH2677> up the altar. <WH4196>
You shall make <WH6213> poles <WH905> for the altar, <WH4196> poles <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlay <WH6823> them with brass. <WH5178>
Its poles <WH905> shall be put <WH935> into the rings, <WH2885> and the poles <WH905> shall be on the two <WH8147> sides <WH6763> of the altar, <WH4196> when carrying it. <WH5375>
You shall make <WH6213> it with hollow <WH5014> planks. <WH3871> They shall make <WH6213> it as it has been shown <WH7200> you on the mountain. <WH2022>

"You shall make <WH6213> the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle: <WH4908> for the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward <WH8486> there shall be hangings <WH7050> for the court <WH2691> of fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336> one hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> long <WH753> for one <WH259> side: <WH6285>

and its pillars <WH5982> shall be twenty, <WH6242> and their sockets <WH134> twenty, <WH6242> of brass; <WH5178> the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> shall be of silver. <WH3701>

Likewise for the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> in length <WH753> there shall be hangings <WH7050> one hundred <WH3967> cubits long, <WH753> and its pillars <WH5982> twenty, <WH6242> and their sockets <WH134> twenty, <WH6242> of brass; <WH5178> the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars, <WH5982> and their fillets, <WH2838> of silver. <WH3701>

For the breadth <WH7341> of the court <WH2691> on the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> shall be hangings <WH7050> of fifty <WH2572> cubits; <WH520> their pillars <WH5982> ten, <WH6235> and their sockets <WH134> ten. <WH6235>
The breadth <WH7341> of the court <WH2691> on the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> eastward <WH4217> shall be fifty <WH2572> cubits. <WH520>
The hangings <WH7050> for the one side <WH3802> of the gate shall be fifteen <WH2568> cubits; <WH520> their pillars <WH5982> three, <WH7969> and their sockets <WH134> three. <WH7969>
For the other <WH8145> side <WH3802> shall be hangings <WH7050> of fifteen <WH2568> cubits; <WH5982> their pillars three, <WH7969> and their sockets <WH134> three. <WH7969>

For the gate <WH8179> of the court <WH2691> shall be a screen <WH4539> of twenty <WH6242> cubits, <WH520> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8144> and fine twined <WH7806> linen, <WH8336> the work of the embroiderer; <WH7551> their pillars <WH5982> four, <WH702> and their sockets <WH134> four. <WH702>
All the pillars <WH5982> of the court <WH2691> around <WH5439> shall be filleted <WH2836> with silver; <WH3701> their hooks <WH2053> of silver, <WH3701> and their sockets <WH134> of brass. <WH5178>

The length <WH753> of the court <WH2691> shall be one hundred <WH3967> cubits, <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> fifty <WH2572> every where, <WH2572> and the height <WH6967> five <WH2568> cubits, <WH520> of fine twined <WH7806> linen, <WH8336> and their sockets <WH134> of brass. <WH5178>
All the instruments <WH3627> of the tabernacle <WH4908> in all its service, <WH5656> and all its pins, <WH3489> and all the pins <WH3489> of the court, <WH2691> shall be of brass. <WH5178>

"You shall command <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they bring <WH3947> to you pure <WH2134> olive <WH2132> oil <WH8081> beaten <WH3795> for the light, <WH3974> to cause a lamp <WH5216> to burn <WH5927> continually. <WH8548>

In the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> outside <WH2351> the veil <WH6532> which is before the testimony, <WH5715> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall keep it in order <WH6186> from evening <WH6153> to morning <WH1242> before <WH6440> Yahweh: <WH3068> it shall be a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> throughout their generations <WH1755> on the behalf of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
